subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr scored three goals to lead the defending champion Czech Republic past the United States, 4-0, on Wednesday in the quarterfinals of the world championships in Bratislava, Slovakia.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr scored three goals to lead the defending champion Czech Republic past the United States, 4-0, on Wednesday in the quarterfinals of the world championships in Bratislava, Slovakia.
